original_text: But God makes that seed become a plant. Each plant has its own special body that God has chosen for it.
korean_text: 하나님이 그 뜻대로 그에게 형체를 주시되 각 종자에게 그 형체를 주시느니라

sentences.original_text: But God makes that seed become a plant
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 씨앗이 식물이 되게 만드십니다

sentences.original_text: Each plant has its own special body
sentences.korean_translation: 각 식물은 자신의 특별한 몸을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that God has chosen for it
